post.body: That's a great idea. Great first photo as well. Thx for sharing.
Thx for the RT. Have a happy new year!
Correction. Orphans and Vulnerable Children. - DL
OVC = Orphaned and Vulnerable Children
Great point. Something our field staff see alot of. The gov'tmental term for kids like this is OVC - http://is.gd/ee5J - DL
Agreed. Trafficking could always use more press. One way to make that happen is to make it a priority for the new prez admin.-DL
Nice t-shirt in the profile pic!
Nice points. Thx.
Is this the story you're referencing? http://is.gd/dXCx
Thanks to all who helped us make our $100k matching goal this wk! Happy New Year!
Its still 2008 in 17 time zones! Still time left to double or triple the impact of your giving before 2009! www.ijm.org/give for details. DL
RT @naomisea: @IJMHQ i'm loving just courage-- i want to be finished with the visitor's centre!
Online giving issues resolved. Less than 48 hrs to help us meet our $100K matching gift. $100 gifts doubled, $500 tripled! www.ijm.org/give
This story has gained a bit of traction these last 2 days. Any thoughts on why this story & why now? - http://is.gd/dXCx - DL
Looks like there was an error w. online giving this morning. Working on a fix right now. DM me if this has affected you. - DL
NYT's Nick Kristof talks about starting a school in Cambodia - http://is.gd/ebIB
RT - Recent $100k matching gift means donations of $100 or more will be 2x & gifts of $500 will be 3x. Deadline 12/31. www.ijm.org/give - DL
RT @EBain: 1st posting since the break, & I've got a lot to say! A look at "Just Courage" by IJM's Gary Haugen: http://is.gd/e0jn
A recent $100k matching gift means donations of $100 or more will be 2x & gifts of $500 will be 3x. Deadline 12/31. www.ijm.org/give - DL
Child 'slavery' now being imported to U.S. - http://is.gd/dXCx
